trips.description: Explore the last remaining wonder of the ancient world with our expert Egyptologist guide. Includes entrance to the pyramids, the Sphinx, and the Valley Temple.
Full-day tour of Luxor's magnificent temples, including the spectacular Karnak Temple complex and the beautifully preserved Luxor Temple.
3-day luxury cruise from Aswan to Luxor, visiting Kom Ombo, Edfu, and Esna temples along the way. All meals included.
Early morning tour to the magnificent Abu Simbel temples, built by Ramses II. Includes round-trip flights from Aswan.
Explore Egypt's Mediterranean jewel, visiting the Catacombs, Pompey's Pillar, Qaitbay Citadel, and the new Alexandria Library.
Overnight camping adventure in Egypt's surreal White Desert. See the amazing chalk rock formations and sleep under the stars.
Full-day snorkeling trip in the Red Sea's famous Blue Hole with lunch included. See colorful coral reefs and tropical fish.
Guided tour of Cairo's Egyptian Museum, home to the world's largest collection of Pharaonic antiquities including Tutankhamun's treasures.
